name: Jumping Dolls Demo
description:
This is more of a proof-of-concept than a full game. I made it for the 2022 UNC College Game Jam.

How to play: You control a set of nesting dolls and have to manage the weight of what you are currently controlling. Each doll has a number, with 1 being the biggest doll and 5 being the smallest. 

To drop a doll inside the one you are controlling, press "S" and then the number for the doll you wish to drop. (S+5 will drop the smallest doll, for instance).

To control a doll you currently are not controlling, press that doll's number. For example, pressing 5 will put you in control of the smallest doll.

To merge into another doll, press "S" and that doll's number while touching it.

Move left and right with A and D, jump with W.
